actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing officers of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Elects the officers of the House of Representatives as follows: (1) Benjamin J. Guthrie, of Virginia, as Clerk; (2) Jack Russ, of Maryland, as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James T. Malloy, of New York, as Doorkeeper; (4) Robert V. Rota, of Pennsylvania, as Postmaster; and (5) Reverend James David Ford, of Virginia, as Chaplain.

titles.title: A resolution electing officers of the House of Representatives.
